# Data
Generating random data.
```{r}
x = rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
y = rnorm(1000, 1.5, 0.1)
z = x*y
```

# Histogram
This is a test of modifying code.
```{r}
hist(z)
```

# Plots
Look how cool the plots look.
```{r}
plot(x, y)
plot(x, z)
```
